title: not letting me log in
body: when I try to log in I type in my username and password right but it says there wrong

replies.body: If you look at the Service Status, you should know why you can't log in ( https://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_US#na ).

It seems like our login servers had a couple issues a bit ago, and a lot of our players are having a hard time getting logged in. We're working on getting everything smoothed out as quickly as possible, and you can always check for updates on our [**status page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)!
